thought: The WHOIS data indicates that the domain was recently created and the registrant's information is redacted for privacy, which is not uncommon but can be a tactic used by fraudulent websites to hide their identity. The domain status is clientTransferProhibited, which is a normal status for a domain name that is currently registered. However, the recent creation date could be a red flag when combined with the other suspicious characteristics observed on the website. I should check the website's reputation online to see if there are any reports or reviews indicating that it is a scam.

Scammers impersonate well-known companies, recruit for fake jobs on LinkedIn and other job platforms
Scammers are lurking on LinkedIn and other job sites, posing as “recruiters” for well-known companies. Why would they not pay the vendor directly instead of sending it to me just to send it out via cashapp
There are very many scammers in Europe countries for example the prolink innovations connection, profylink all are scammers, they have cheated my €90 and diciving me
that money is for application process, medical certificate, documents process but now if am to connect to them through email, they can respond to me.
"}, {'url': 'https://www.forbes.com/sites/jackguttentag/2021/08/07/email-scam-alertthis-one-almost-caught-me/', 'content': 'Fortunately, or so I thought at the time, the email seemed to have understood that mistakes sometimes occur, and they provided a telephone number to call in the event that I had any questions. My immediate reaction was that someone had found a way to hoodwink one of the automated payment systems I use in order to generate a spurious payment. Anxious to retrieve my money, I called the number provided and the respondent said graciously that he would fix the problem, but he needed some information from me. If you aren’t completely sure, the fool-safe approach is to wait and see whether the item for which you have allegedly been billed shows up in any of your statements.
 Anyone who has granted a recurrent service provider, such as a newspaper, the right to bill them automatically, is a likely target for this scam.'}, {'url': 'https://www.scamvoid.net/', 'content': 'Find a list of most viewed website reports of this month. Use this service to check the online reputation of a website, check if a website is safe or a scam, check if a website is safe to buy from, check if a website is legit and trusted by other users.'}]
